name: SUPERHOTline Miami Deluxe
description:
CHECK OUT SHOOTOUT INC, THE STANDALONE GAME BASED ON SUPERHOTLINE MIAMI! DEMO VERSION IS AVAILABLE HERE : https://albatr.itch.io/shootout-inc Important info : The Deluxe version doesn't have custom levels support yet. There are multiple download options :
- SUPERHOTline_Miami_Deluxe-r001 is the download for the latest deluxe version, but it doesn't have custom levels support yet.
- SUPERHOTline_Miami-UPDATE5-2016-03-01 is the download for the old version which has custom levels support. What happens when you mix SUPER HOT with Hotline Miami ? You get SUPERHOTline Miami ! Time moves only when you move, but this time, from a top down perspective and with some extra violence. This is an upgraded version of the original SUPERHOTline Miami, it features many improvements used by its sequel SHOOTOUT Inc (The full game based on SUPERHOTline Miami), such as improved bullet hit detection, better hitboxes, AI reworks, new sprites and animations etc.
